abstract: Companhia Vale do Rio Doce, the world’s largest producer of iron ore, said on Monday that it was in talks with a rival, Xstrata, about a merger.
lead_paragraph: Companhia Vale do Rio Doce, the world’s largest producer of iron ore, said on Monday that it was in talks with a rival, Xstrata, about a merger.

headline.main: Brazil’s Vale Confirms Talks to Merge With Xstrata
